flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: This tutorial is for someone with basic lampworking skills and glass knowledge. Borosilicate glass, oxygen/propane torch.

guide.summary: How to make a lampwork glass flower pendant.
guide.title: Lampwork Glass Flower Pendant Tutorial
